DOC.brief_summary: Study design : randomize , crossover trial . Each patient perform three different airway clearance technique ( Autogenic drainage , slow expiratory glottis open lateral posture [ ELTGOL ] , temporary- positive expiratory pressure [ T-PEP ] similar autonomy degree randomize order . Each technique apply 3 session one week alternate day ( Monday /Wednesday/Friday Tuesday/Thursday/Saturday ) . The time spend bronchial session 40 minute . Seven day wash-out time period different technique .
DOC.brief_title: 3 Airway Clearance Techniques Non Cystic Fibrosis Bronchiectasis
DOC.criteria: 1 . Non Cystic Fibrosis bronchiectasis diagnose High Resolution Computed Tomographic 2 . Mean sputum production ≥ 15 ml /24h 3 . Clinical stability last 6 week 4 . Not carry regular chest physiotherapy 5 . Forced expiratory volume 1 second ≥ 30 % pred . ; Forced Vital Capacity ≥ 45 % pred . peak expiratory flow > 270 L/s 1 . Smoker nonsmoker form le 2 year 2 . Cystic fibrosis 3 . Active tuberculosis sarcoidosis
DOC.keyword: Slow expiration glottis open lateral posture ( ELTGOL )
